description: SmallFoot discovers that the large image is always loaded no matter the screen size. As he understands it, the small image in the src attribute only works as a fallback. Browsers wants a list of all avaliable versions of the image in the srcset attribute.
todo: Add both images to the srcset attribute, starting with the smallest and separated by a comma.

correct.headline: Good job!
correct.text: Thanks to you, the browser now has two images to choose from! But we still have work to do...

wrong.headline: Something's not right...
wrong.text: That wasn't helpful for SmallFoot. Are you sure that the srcset looked like this: "birthday_small.jpg, birthday_large.jpg"?
